name: backwoods
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a place in the countryside that is a long way from any town and in which not many people live: I grew up in the backwoods, with no cable TV and no Internet access.

Add to word list
a place that is off by itself, not near to transportation or a larger town: I grew up in the backwoods of North Carolina.
